mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TBL_USER (USER_ID, USER_NAME, USER_NICKNAME, PASSWORD, EMAIL, PHONE, BIRTH, GENDER) VALUES (#{userId}, #{userName}, #{userNickName}, #{password}, #{email}, #{phone}, #{birth}, #{gender})
INSERT INTO TBL_ADDRESS ( USER_ID, USER_NAME, PHONE, ADDRESS, ADDRESS_DETAIL, ZONECODE) VALUES ( #{userId}, #{userName}, #{phone}, #{address}, #{addressDetail}, #{zonecode})
mapper.select: SELECT u.user_id, u.user_name, u.user_nickname, u.email, u.phone, u.birth , a.address, a.address_Detail, a.zonecode FROM tbl_user u JOIN tbl_address a ON u.user_id = a.user_id WHERE u.user_id = #{userId}
